description:
Left Bank boutique hotel short walk from Notre-Dame

Lively Latin Quarter
The modern Grand Hotel Saint Michel is in the heart of the Latin Quarter. You can walk to Notre-Dame Cathedral or the trendy Saint-Germain-des-Prés area in just 10 minutes. Cluny–La Sorbonne Metro Station is a 3-minute walk north, Luxembourg RER Station is 2 minutes south.

Family-friendly and fun
The Luxembourg Gardens are just a block from the hotel. There, you can jog, play tennis, or rent a bike. Traveling with your family? Visit the large playground area there, too.

Hot breakfast buffet
Guests love the breakfast buffet with its wide array of choices, including healthy, organic options and bread straight from the oven. The daily afternoon reception serving tea, coffee, and treats goes down well, too.

Style with perks
Modern, stylish guestrooms feature comfortable beds, soft pillows, free WiFi, and flat-screen TVs. Guests rave about the special extras, like Hermès toiletries.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Left Bank boutique hotel short walk from Notre-Dame

Lively Latin Quarter
The modern Grand Hotel Saint Michel is in the heart of the Latin Quarter. You can walk to Notre-Dame Cathedral or the trendy Saint-Germain-des-Prés area in just 10 minutes. Cluny–La Sorbonne Metro Station is a 3-minute walk north, Luxembourg RER Station is 2 minutes south.

Family-friendly and fun
The Luxembourg Gardens are just a block from the hotel. There, you can jog, play tennis, or rent a bike. Traveling with your family? Visit the large playground area there, too.

Hot breakfast buffet
Guests love the breakfast buffet with its wide array of choices, including healthy, organic options and bread straight from the oven. The daily afternoon reception serving tea, coffee, and treats goes down well, too.

Style with perks
Modern, stylish guestrooms feature comfortable beds, soft pillows, free WiFi, and flat-screen TVs. Guests rave about the special extras, like Hermès toiletries.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value: The Grand Hotel Saint Michel features fitness equipment, two lounge rooms with small bar, international newspapers, and high-speed wireless Internet access. A hot-and-cold breakfast buffet (surcharge) is served in the stone-vaulted dining room, decorated in murals, vintage Hollywood photographs, and red-and-gold fabrics. Breakfast can be served in the guest rooms on request. All pastries are baked fresh on the premises.

DINING.value:
The hotel does not have its own restaurant, but there are several dining options within the surrounding area.

Nearby restaurants:
Delices St-Michel

Brasserie Balzar

Les Fontaines

Please check the Rooms and Rates page to see which rates include breakfast.

RECREATION.value:
One block from the hotel is the large park, Jardin du Luxembourg, where guests can jog, play tennis, or participate in the French game boules(similar to lawn bowling). There is a large playground area for children.

Hotel guests receive complimentary admission to a health club on the Boulevard St-Germain (10 minutes away on foot).

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Sorbonne University - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Pantheon - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Luxembourg Gardens - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Odeon Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Luxembourg Palace - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Ecole normale superieure - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Notre Dame Cathedral - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Paradis Latin - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

Sainte Chapelle - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Les Deux Magots - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Pont Neuf - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Theatre du Chatelet - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Grande Galerie de l'Evolution - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Jardin des Plantes - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The closest major airports to Grand Hotel Saint Michel are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 24.1 km / 15 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Saint Michel is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
By Sorbonne College
Located in Paris' popular Latin Quarter district, this hotel is one block from the Sorbonne College, the Panthéon and Luxembourg Gardens, and ten minutes from Notre-Dame Cathedral.

NATIONAL_RATING.value: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for buffet breakfast: EUR 15 per person (approximately)
  • Airport shuttle fee: EUR 60.00 per vehicle (one way)

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:


  • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi in rooms

HCOM_IN_HOTEL.value:
• Buffet breakfast daily (surcharge)
  • Room service (during limited hours)
  • Coffee/tea in a common area

HCOM_MANDATORY_TAXES.value: • A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.48 per person, per night

HCOM_FEES_FACILITIES.value: Parking is available nearby and costs EUR 30 per 24 hours

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Buffet breakfast is offered for an extra charge of EUR 15 per person (approximately)

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_KIDS.value: Babysitting/childcare is available for an extra charge

HCOM_FEES_SERVICES.value: Airport shuttle service is offered for an extra charge of EUR 60.00 per vehicle (one way)

GOLD.value: Grand Hotel Saint Michel is a stylish, modern hotel in the heart of the lively Latin Quarter, with easy access to many Paris highlights. You’ll enjoy perks like Hermès toiletries, free WiFi, and comfy beds with soft pillows in a quiet environment. A hot breakfast buffet is also available.

GUESTS_LOVE.value:
Guests Love
  • Easy access to Metro and other public transport

  • Free WiFi

  • Comfortable beds and pillows

  • Walking distance to major attractions

    • Keep in Mind
  • Sink and toilet are in different areas of guestroom

  • Compact rooms typical of a Paris hotel

END_OF_THE_DAY.value:
At the end of the day…
Our guests love the Left Bank location, with the Luxembourg Gardens and other top attractions just a short walk away. Some note that the free WiFi can be unreliable at times, but most appreciate the clean, stylish guestrooms.

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 47 smoke-free guestrooms
  • Breakfast available
  • Room service
  • Fitness center
  • 24-hour business center
  • Airport shuttle
  • In-room childcare
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Coffee/tea in a common area
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Car rentals on site
  • Front desk safe
  • Laundry service
  • Meeting room
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge services
  • Free newspapers in the lobby
  • Luggage storage
  • Tour/ticket assistance

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Grand Hotel Saint Michel offers a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of Sorbonne University and Pantheon, plus an airport shuttle is available for EUR 60.00 per vehicle one way. Guests can enjoy the fitness center, and buffet breakfast is available daily. Rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like slippers and Select Comfort beds with premium linens.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• Heart of Paris
  • Notre Dame Cathedral (0.5 mi / 0.9 km)
